name: file_analyzer
description: Analyze uploaded files to extract information and content

input_parameters.name: uploaded_file
input_parameters.description: File to analyze (supports text, JSON, CSV, and image files)

input_parameters.name: analysis_type
input_parameters.description: Type of analysis: basic, content, metadata

output_parameters.name: analysis_report
output_parameters.description: Detailed analysis report based on file type

output_parameters.name: file_stats
output_parameters.description: File statistics (line count, word count, etc.)
